name: Flying Soul
description: Fun and challenging flying game as you've never seen before! This is not another flying game. With a proposal never seen before, you will be challenged to do fantastic moves to achieve your goals. To win you and your Spaceship will have to be only one soul!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Newer Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 260 or ATI 4850 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1400 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Newer Processor: 2.5+ GHz Quad core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or better, ATI 7950 or better DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1400 MB available space
